channel.title: Some fucker is crashing my server...blackmailing...xx k03d xx... damnit
channel.description: a guy gets on my server...xx k03d xx... demands modship... i ban him next thing i know he crashes the whole shit i'm scared he told me stuff idk if its true but he said he can crash and it'll never be hostable. hes not even online and hes doing this shit. sombody help. :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: Some fucker is crashing my server...blackmailing...xx k03d xx... damnit
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Mod Nate:

Just do what I do and send a trojan or a brute force to there comp =)

Excellent idea!

dragster32:

a guy gets on my server…xx k03d xx… demands modship… i ban him next thing i know he crashes the whole shit i’m scared he told me stuff idk if its true but he said he can crash and it’ll never be hostable. hes not even online and hes doing this shit. sombody help. :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

Make backups of your server if he uses hacking tools to crash or delete your server.

its called a server DDoSer

it sends packets full of gibberish to a port and ip

if not, make lots and lots of backups
